Articles.Content:
Have visited every body in the system. Still many places of interest I have never been too...

- North and south pole of most places

- Some easter eggs (eg. Tylo cave, Duna face)

- Very low solar orbit as well as edge of solar SoI

- Small islands on Laythe

This basically

Haven't:

Landed on Moho (only flyby)

Landed and returned from Eve (only probe-lander, I built a manned return lander, but never went there, new versions of KSP keep comming out before I get to it.)

Joolean moons other than laythe. Have constructed landers for all of them, but never got around to launching them.

Dres (at all)

Eeloo (at all)

Edited August 14, 2014 by AlexanderB

I have never visited Eeloo

I also have never done an manned return mission to Tylo (I have landed unmanned probes and rovers)

I have done manned missions to get science from low low kerbol (the sun) orbit.
I don't remember if I've been to Dres or not, and I'm pretty sure I've never bothered with Vall or Bop
I have landed on the Mun many times and on Minmus only once. Beyond one robotic Eve probe, I've never been anywhere else.

Been to kerbin (duh), The Mun, Minmus, Duna, and Ike (Duna and Ike were the same mission, landed on both, waiting for a duna to kerbin transfer window to come in.. a year. Not the amount of time i'd prefer, but hey, Bill and his fellow kerbonauts can enjoy the view.)

Next mission will be Jool, it's transfer window is in a mere 17 days or so, so I gotta make the ships fast. Probably gonna visit laythe. I'll have to send Jeb over there, since he's been doing nothing but sit in a space station for the past 2 years or so... I'll probably keep jeb at laythe, far more interesting than a space station around kerbin.
I have landed a probe on every body in the System. I've only sent (and returned) Kerbals to Mun, Minmus and Duna, however.
I've yet to get to Jool or Eeloo. Contracts is really encouraging me to be efficient with fuel and launches which I hope will help me finally get there.... eventually.
Never been to anywhere beyond the Kerbin system. To be honest, I've never tried it out. I'm busy building spaceplanes and stations in LKO.

I've never been to Tylo, Bop, or Pol, since all of my efforts thus far in the Joolian system have been focused on Laythe and Vall. I did go to Eeloo once, and I planned a mission to use KAS to suspend my ship in the Northern Mohole, but the former never came home and the latter never got launched because then the Asteroid Redirect Mission update came out and I abandoned that save for a fresh one. I've never done any proper exploration of any body other than Minmus, which in many of my saves has extensive "bases" (aka a bunch of landers set down next to each other) and manned/unmanned rovers. Since I just got KSPI, I want to use my new massive nuclear ships to do something cool on Eeloo, but I haven't found the time yet.

I think I'd better count places I have been.

Kerbin

Mun

Minmus

Duna (unmanned)

I`ve been everywhere man, I`ve been everywhere...

I went to all the bodies and planted a flag within the first month of having the game. All stock. They all returned except the poor Eve victim. I had not had the game enough time to realize I had done everything there was to do so I would do things differently if I could. I then became a mod junkie...

Myself I would like a body in the system that is impossible to get to without a multi part orbital assembly or a gravity assist. Once you can get into orbit the game becomes pretty (too) easy.

I've never crash-landed on the "surfaces" of the Sun or Jool.

I've done manned missions/returns to every other body in the solar system so far, and captured asteroids too. I've also sent a Voyager probe on an escape trajectory. I'm running out of frontiers.

Edited August 14, 2014 by NecroBones

I've been to all the bodies. The only one I haven't sent a manned mission to (apart from the obvious sun and Jool) is Eve. At some point I might be bothered to design a craft capable of returning form the surface, but I've been spending most of my time lately doing things in the local Kerbin system.

Kerbin South pole

But seriously, Tylo and Eeloo. Tylo, because $%#%#& gravity and Eeloo because I always miss the launch window for some reason ...
never landed on kerbin's badlands, been to every planet

4GB of RAM is all KSP could use until now (with the experimental 64-bit version) and RAM is not the most important factor in big ships, its a factor of "How many mods can I load?"

Today, I have learned something.

I'm lookin' at you, signature...

I've been everywhere. Manned returns from Moho, Duna, Dres, Eeloo, and more moons. I think I'm only missing Tylo, Laythe, and Eve for return missions.

I somehow always end up entering the Jool system orbiting the wrong direction ><. So much DV wasted correcting that.

Edit: I may have never actually even landed a probe on Tylo. I have sent at least 10 would be landers slamming into it's surface having run out of fuel. I always forget that it has one massive gravity well.
Moho, Gilly, most of Jool's moons and Eeloo. If you don't count 'crashing horribly for a few quicksaves and then just staying in low orbit' as 'being there', you could also count Ike.

I didn't explore all of Jool's moons, aside from that, I orbited (landed in most) all the bodies in the Kerbal Solar System.

One landing I specially enjoined was Moho, I had plans for just polar orbit, but somehow I managed to mess stuff up so bad, I started falling towards the ground. Thankfully I had enough fuel to land...without any landing gear or anything, and then everything, except the capsule, exploded.

With probes and/or rovers, I've been everywhere except for Tylo (orbiter + impactor only) and the Sun.

As for manned missions... 3 Duna landings, 1 Ike landing and an Eve flyby. I'll try to fix this soon though.
Never been past Vall's orbit in the jool system. I just don't see a reason to go there so far. I have at least attempted missions on all other bodies though.

Lander:

-Kerbin (duh)

-Mun

-Minmus

Interested:

-Duna

-Ike

Flyby:

Sun

Duna (only reached orbit, then wild Ike attacked and dropped me off.)
Never to Tylo's surface, but I don't have much motivation, either. It's the Mun's difficult cousin.

Without editing my save file here are my never been there stats. Unmanned, haven't been to eeloo yet. Manned haven't done a Moho landing/stable orbit (did do a moho SOI slingshot), also haven't done manned landings of one of Jool's moons (need to check that career save)
